title: Geek Chef Air Fryer, 6 Slice 11QT Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo, Air Fryer Oven,Roast, Bake, Broil, Reheat, Fry Oil-Free, Extra Large Convection Countertop Oven, Accessories Included, Stainless Steel
description: The Geek Chef 16 Quart Air Fryer Oven is the perfect kitchen appliance for your family's cooking needs. 1.With its large 16 quart capacity, it can accommodate up to 6 slices of bread, a 9-inch pizza, or 700g of chicken wings and 400g of french fries, making it ideal for family meals and holiday dinners.
